changes_made: Added 'focus-ring' class for focus state styling

patterns_discovered: Dynamic class composition based on component state
Consistent hover and focus state management
gotchas_discovered: Initial implementation lacked explicit focus styles
Need for aria attributes to enhance accessibility
Importance of focus visibility across active and inactive states

improvements: Improved visual feedback for interactive elements

recommendations: Audit other interactive components for consistent focus styles
Consider creating a reusable focus-ring utility class
Ensure color contrast meets WCAG guidelines for focus states
